subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: While many of her fellow American players are gearing up for the new National Women’s Soccer League, which opens this weekend, Megan Rapinoe is enjoying playing and living in France.
snippet: While many of her fellow American players are gearing up for the new National Women’s Soccer League, which opens this weekend, Megan Rapinoe is enjoying playing and living in France.
